title: Mark Rowley’s CV
text:
Computer Scientist, Business Consultant, Creative Writer

mrowley621@gmail.com



Attending Brigham Young University - Idaho Co-Founder of a Creative Studio


Data Science, Software Design, UI/UX Design, Data Visualization, Creative Writing, Digital Concept Art



AI Training & Development, Biotechnology, Adaptive Infrastructure




2022-2023 Technology Specialist, Volunteer Missionary - Provided reports on data collected from dozens of sources. - Genereated training content, and official communication between different departments.
2024-2024 IT Specialist, Business Workshop - Managed website and incoming online orders. - Created trainings on using company software and standardized financial reporting methods.
2024-2024 Chief Financial Officer, Business Workshop - Managed a small team of accountants to generate financial and inventory reports. - Simplified company financial tracking software. - Trained employees in the use of financial software.
2024-Now School Custodian - Work individually and in varied teams to complete detail-oriented tasks in a timely manner. - Assist in smaller leadership roles as needed.



2016-2020 Glacier Peak High School, Glacier Peak
2017-2020 Everett Community College, Everett - Associate Degree of General Studies
2020-Now Brigham Young University - Idaho, Rexburg - Bachelors Degree of Computer Science - Minor in Business Management
